entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 3:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: N 13 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
